mapper.select: select * from (select memberId, bookReason, to_char(bookDate) as bookDate, bookTime from hos_book where bookDate >= #{book.today}) where bookDate <= #{book.bookableDateLocal} order by bookDate, bookTime
mapper.insert: insert into hos_book(memberId, bookReason, bookDate, bookTime) values(#{memberId}, #{bookReason}, #{bookDate}, #{bookTime})
mapper.delete: delete from hos_book where memberId = #{memberId} and to_char(bookDate) = #{bookDate} and bookTime = #{bookTime}
mapper.select: select * from (select to_char(bookDate) as bookDate, count(bookTime) as bookCount from hos_book where bookDate >= #{book.today} group by bookDate) where bookDate <= #{book.bookableDateLocal} order by bookDate
select bookTime from hos_book where bookDate = #{bookDate}
